TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IgnoreMemberAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 會導致管理檢測忽略已檢測類別相關的成員。

span.span: Causes the associated member of an instrumented class to be ignored by management instrumentation.

summary.span: 注意：WMI .NET 程式庫目前被視為最終狀態，針對影響這些程式庫的非安全性相關問題，不會提供進一步的開發、增強功能或更新。

span.span: Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries.

summary.span: [MI API](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) 應使用於所有新的開發。

span.span: The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設建構函式會將所有的欄位初始化成為其預設值。The default constructor initializes any fields to their default values. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
